item.title: Galaxy Digital Increases its Holdings by 4,272 BTC in Q2, Bringing Total Holdings to 17,102 BTC
item.description: On August 5th, Galaxy Digital added 4,272 bitcoins during the second quarter of 2025, and its total bitcoin holdings reached 17,102 as of June 30th.It should be noted, however: This figure encompasses bitcoins held in custody and through lending — the net digital asset figure after subtracting liabilities is less than 500 million USD.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX net outflow of 49,000 Ethereum
item.description: On August 5th, based on Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, the total net outflow of Ethereum on CEX was 49,000 ETH. The top three outflow exchanges are as follows:· Kraken, with an outflow of 26,500 ETH;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 26,000 ETH;· OKX, with an outflow of 24,400 ETH.In addition, Bitfinex witnessed an inflow of 35,800 ETH and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch TaleX (X) on August 7th
item.description: August 5th. As per an official declaration, Binance Alpha is set to list TaleX (X) on August 7th.Qualified users can access the Alpha event page and claim an airdrop by utilizing Binance Alpha points once Alpha trading commences. Further details will be provided later.In prior news, the application-layer project TaleX was previously selected for the BNB Chain 8th Season MVB Accelerator Program.

item.title: Trump Threatens to Increase Tariffs on India Significantly Amid Russian Oil Trade, India and Kremlin Respond
item.description: August 5th: On August 4th, US President Trump gave a threat that he would increase tariffs on India significantly. According to media like Reuters and Sky News UK, India responded on the 5th, indicating that it would take all necessary actions to safeguard national interests and economic security.Sky News UK reported that a spokesperson for the Indian Ministry of External Affairs said that since the Russia-Ukraine conflict broke out, India has been "targeted" by the US and the EU because of importing oil from Russia. "In fact, the reason why India began to import oil from Russia was that after the conflict occurred, traditional oil supplies shifted to Europe," the spokesperson stated. "At that time, the US actively encouraged India and similar import activities to enhance the stability of the global energy market." According to the latest news from Agence France-Presse on the 5th, the Kremlin in Russia also criticized Trump's threat to increase tariffs on India, emphasizing that "sov

item.title: A whale has accumulated over 39,000 ETH through FalconX in the past two days
item.description: On August 5th, according to Arkham Monitoring, Whale 0x86F purchased $1.416 billion worth of ETH from FalconX within the past two days. The total quantity purchased was 39,294 coins.

item.title: Publicly traded company Robin Energy makes its first $3 million Bitcoin purchase
item.description: On August 5th, as monitored by @btcNLNico, the publicly listed company Robin Energy in the US made its first purchase of Bitcoin worth $3 million to implement its Bitcoin treasury strategy.Robin Energy is a publicly listed company in the US with its headquarters in Cyprus and specializes in international vessel ownership and providing global energy transportation services.

item.title: Bitcoin Bounces Back Above $115,000
item.description: On August 5th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and rose above $115,000. It is currently trading at $115,033.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks See Mixed Pre-market Trading, BNMR Up 1.35%
item.description: On August 5th, based on the market data from Rockflow, the pre-market trading of U.S. crypto stocks showed a mixed performance. This includes:The largest Ethereum hodler institution BNMR increased by 1.35%;SBET rose by 2.61%;CRCL decreased by 1.63%;COIN experienced a slight drop of 0.13%.

item.title: Binance's new Alpha project INFINIT unveils Tokenomics: 5% of the total supply allocated for the initial airdrop
item.description: August 5th. Binance's new Alpha project INFINIT made the tokenomics announcement. The team declared that 5% of the total supply is set aside for the initial airdrop. The purpose of this is to achieve two strategic goals:- Reward Past Contributions: Acknowledge early product users and community members for their feedback, concept validation, and idea dissemination regarding INFINIT.- Support Future Participation in Agentic DeFi Economy: Offer the community IN to enable them to directly participate in further shaping the Agentic DeFi economy, whether through governance participation, staking, or direct engagement in one-click agent execution.Consequently, holders of INFINIT Stones, INFINIT Yappers, community contributors, and ecosystem partners will be entitled to this airdrop. The airdrop portal will open for claiming starting from August 7, 2025.

item.title: Binance Futures to Launch Composite Index Universal Perpetual Contract
item.description: August 5th. As per an official announcement, Binance Futures is set to launch the ALL 75x Composite Index U Perpetual Contract on August 6, 2025, at 5:00 PM (UTC+8).The Binance ALL Composite Index tracks all USDT-margined perpetual contracts on Binance Futures, with the following exclusions:The ETHBTC perpetual contract;U Perpetual Contracts quoted in USDC or other stablecoins;U-margined delivery contracts;Composite Index perpetual contracts;Perpetual pre-market trading;Coin-margined perpetual and delivery contracts.The Binance ALL Composite Index is calculated by using the weighted average price of all constituent real-time index prices.
